website_summaries.verdict: While it isn't the best option for short hair, it gets praise for producing soft, defined curls on longer styles with minimal effort once you learn how to use it.
pros: Heat level is easy to adjust to the desired setting
a digital display indicates the exact temperature
Not very heavy, so it's easy to maneuver
Can curl hair in two directions
cons: Mastering it takes a bit of time and practice for novice users
Somewhat awkward for styling shorter hair
Placing too much hair in the chamber at one time can result in tangles

customer_reviews.author: michelle brownstein

customer_reviews.author: Monica Case

customer_reviews.title: 100 stars

customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: Best curling tool I've used.
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest tool for getting beach curls. You can take very small sections and curl closer to the head to get more of a spiral look, or take larger chunks and start the curl a third of the way from your head. Be aware that if you take too much hair the CHI gets angry. Not sure what too much means for your hair? Just go ahead and keep adding to the sections of hair you curl, you will know when CHI gets angry with you. Oh, you will know! Worth every penny and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam and Dominika (family account)

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and dynamite curls

It's a very basic straightener, and I curl my hair with it as you would a ribbon with a pair of scissors. This gave me much healthier and more even curls. The adjustable temperature is great because you can decide if you want tight or loose curls and the automatic spin just makes it so simple and amazing. Totally worth the $100.

Totally worth the money to finally be able to curl my hair and make it actually look cute!

Works just as easily as it seems in the video. I would definitely buy it again and highly recommend it.

The main thing that attracted me to this product is no hot parts to touch. It took me a few minutes to figure out how to use it, and once I got my first good curl, I was set, the rest were easy. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: ANYONE CAN DO THIS

customer_reviews.author: Dazzelon

It beeps when you have too much hair in so make sure you section off small enough sections because that is the one thing I struggled with. Overall this tool is amazing and for someone who isn't at great at using a wand or something else this tool is 1000000% the move. I'm so happy I bought it- great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Trishna Sharma

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been thinking about purchasing this for a while but it took a while to actually buy it (because I have to research everything to death). I have long thick hair and I was afraid it would tangle my hair up or just not work. I was wrong on both accounts. I love this thing! It’s easy to use and my curls always turn out beautifully. I tried to get a close up just the way they put the trim on makes it look dirt is stick inside but it’s the same trim. That’s the -1 star. Just a matter of playing with it and figuring out what works best for you.
customer_reviews.author: chio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter tried this and wasn’t impressed. It is important you keep a 90 degree angle, it works and doesn’t tangle. I got fantastic curls! If you cycle it twice the curls are even more stunning. Incredibly easy to use. Just remember your angle and use smaller sections of hair. I honestly don’t think I’ll use the flat iron anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!!
customer_reviews.text: I am IN LOVE and convinced this is the best hair curling device out there! It's super easy to use, so you can't curl your hair in the wrong direction. You can put the device right up to your head/scalp and only feel minimal heat, no burning! The end result are gorgeous curls, quick to use, easy to clean, and just awesome!! Definitely recommend for anyone looking for easy, beautiful curls.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron&Jen

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It usually takes me about an hour to curl my hair with a wand and I’m terrible at using a curling iron on my own hair. This only took me 15 minutes. I have very thick wavy hair and this was super easy to use. You put the hair in the opening where you want the curl to start and pushing the button. It’ll beep when it’s time to take it out. It doesn’t pull your hair and you can rest the curler on your head if your arms get tired and it’s not hot. You can wrap your whole hand around it and it won’t burn you. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted it to work so bad!!!
customer_reviews.text: I so wanted it to work for me. Tangled my hair and kept shutting off without curling it. Took 4-5 times longer to create tanngled mess on my head, than it did to create real curls with 20$ Walmart curler... Returned after trying 3-4 times.

customer_reviews.title: Never curled a single strand.
customer_reviews.text: The first time I tried to use it it’s started buzzing like something was caught in it, and I reset it over and over... I never even got one strand curled. Nothing was caught in it that I ever found.... total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Mitten

customer_reviews.title: Easy, pretty curls
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a new curling device for awhile. I read reviews and decided on this guy. My daughter's were initially afraid to let me do their hair. I get it, the thing is kinda weird looking. It took a little getting used to putting the hair into the chamber. But once I figured that out, it was VERY simple to use. I'm still struggling to use it on my own head because I can't tell which way things go in the mirror. Plus, I think my hair is too short. I am really impressed with how my daughters have beautiful curls, though!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Weems

customer_reviews.title: Met my match
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Chi flat iron for years and love it. I really love beach waves and thought this would be a time saver and better for my fine hair. I have tried and tried and tried, but this product is just not meant to be mine. (Typically I have no issues with styling tools- I met my match) If you are NOT folically challenged, by having thin/fine hair, this might do the trick. As for me, back to the iron. Can not speak to longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Lorin

customer_reviews.title: Best curling iron for dummies!
customer_reviews.text: BEST curling iron EVER! I am 38 years old and I have NEVER been able to curl my hair and not for lack of trying. I am in complete shock! This thing is so easy to use, I curled my whole head in less than 20 min and they were pretty curls not my usual frizzy mess. There is absolutely no way to burn yourself either. I HIGHLY recommend this product to anyone that can't figure out how to curl with a curling iron/flat iron/wand.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those who need a lil help
customer_reviews.text: I’d say, from reading the reviews on here, that if you’re already pretty handy with a curling iron you’ll be disappointed with this one, but if you’re like me and never really had the patience to be good at the whole hair thing, then this is a must have. I loved it so much I went and bought my step daughter one. Don’t expect it to be faster then a regular curling iron, it might even take longer, but it does give people who never mastered a curling iron the chance to rock some beautiful curls :)
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: I’m extremely disappointed, it didn’t work for me at all. My hair got tangled up each and every time, although it quickly released my hair. I returned it the following day.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth & Steve

customer_reviews.title: For the Money? Not Worth It.
customer_reviews.text: I think for the money, it would be better to just by a nice iron or wand. This does curl my hair, but the sections of hair have to be so small that it usually takes more time. The open mouth top makes it so much easier to get hair out than other similar products, but I think a product this expensive should be more versatile, as this product seems to only get me loose and small curls.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T.

customer_reviews.title: Magical hair tool
customer_reviews.text: My hair has n-e-v-e-r held a curl. I have long weird wavy hair that does noting in particular. It's not even a good wavy...it's like just a bunch of cow licks.... Anyways, I have to straighten it all the time, but that has gotten boring over the past 32 years. I had 4 or 5 curling irons that I promptly threw away after receiving this magical item. 10/10 worth the money, would purchase again. This thing is a gift from the hair gods themselves. for my rather abundant/long hair, it takes about 20-25 minutes to style my hair. I do dawdle, though....with practice I'm sure I can reduce that time significantly.
customer_reviews.author: BeckyOnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed

We noticed something was weird because the digital temperature wasn’t completely lighting up like it should. We tried to get it to the desired temperature but it wouldn’t go up or down nor would it spin. We were very disappointed. We will definitely be returning this!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Domingo

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t figure out how to use !
customer_reviews.text: Well I could NOT figure out how to work this thing. Tried several different times until I just gave up and returned. Also my hair DID get caught, which freaked me out. This isn’t Amazon’s issue but it’s an issue with the maker of this product. It’s definitely NOT user friendly. Although I’m still a bit curious as to exactly how this thing works, I’ll never try it again. Once was enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kim B.

customer_reviews.title: My hair NEVER curls but it did with this! Love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this!!!! My hair NEVER curls and I mean NEVER! I have tried so many wands, curlers etc burnt fingers in the process and dreams too (ha!) I said this was going to be my last attempt and it is perfect!!!! Quick, easy, has an anti tangle feature that beeps if you put too much hair in and I did my first trial with no hair product because I can’t find my hairspray and it is amazing!!! My boyfriend even said he wishes he could take me on a date right now! I’m team Chi 150%
customer_reviews.author: Jaque

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I have to admit I was nervous about trying this. I have long, thick hair and I was so scared it would eat it! So far (I’ve used it four times), it’s worked great. customer_reviews.title: Fail
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the beachy waves, which I have been unable to obtain with a curling iron due to tender-headedness and lack of dexterity. This product just sort of curls my hair, but doesn't even do that well. Bits of the section were over-curled, and other bits not curled at all. It's not easy to use, although the videos make it look super-simple. Nope - wrong. Also, my hair going in was soft, and coming out was not - completely unacceptable! After playing with it a dozen times, I'm quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Hater

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great curling iron. Ive always have had problems with curling my hair on a regular iron, have burned my ears many times. This iron, once you learn how to use it properly is great. It took me a few uses before I understood how to use it. It is soft on hair, even on high setting it doesn't fry your hair and it leaves it shinny. I would recommend this product if you're looking for soft curls.
customer_reviews.author: Nena

customer_reviews.title: BEST CURLER EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Oh My God. I have no words. I simply love this curler. You guys have no idea how HARD it was for me to curl every time I had to do it with straightener. My hands got so tired and I was totally frustrated and tired. This curler is so easy to use, it is so quick to curl and no damage at all. If I could I would give it 10 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Callaghan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews on here, but honestly I’ve got long hair, used this on my daughter who has short but thick hair, and it worked well for both! I can put curls in all my hair in about 10-15 mins! Yes you have to be sure to use smaller sections of hair but it’s not as big of a deal to me as it is to others. I’m glad I found this!
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite hair tool
customer_reviews.text: It took me a minute to figure out the proper placement of the tool using a mirror and which button to push to make the curl go towards or away from the face but once I got it I was off and running. It works best on chin length hair or longer and if you want fullness at the root of your hair you will need to use another tool to get the lift bit this is perfect tor the beach wave look.
customer_reviews.author: Swan Quarter House

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be very easy to use and the results were fabulous! Better still, it didn't take long at all. I have medium-long, medium-thick hair and I used the shortest time setting. Curling iron curls tend to fall fairly quickly for me but these curls fell minimally and looked great all day. Not just great but really great. My daughter asked me who did my hair. After four days, still lots of curl! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jsuze

customer_reviews.title: Curls do not last
customer_reviews.text: It could be my hair type, (Caucasian, board straight hair) but the curls from this did not last long enough to walk out of the bathroom. Even with a ton of product, and on the highest heat setting. I was very excited to purchase this, but I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Juju Voodoo

customer_reviews.title: Best curler ever.
customer_reviews.text: This product was so so so easy to use. My hair *almost* got stuck twice my first few trials but no hair was ripped out and it was easy to remove. I was putting the curler too close to my scalp. But once you get the hang of it, I mean it is incredible. 100% worth the money! I used to struggle with curling my hair, and didnt want to invest the time. This took 10 minutes to curl my whole head and that includes learning how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Bobcat5600

customer_reviews.title: More than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have straight, fine hair that would never hold a curl for more than a few hours. Now I have curls that last morning till night. They'd last into tomorrow if I didn't have to sleep on them. The curls are beautiful too. Easy to use once you play with it a few times.
customer_reviews.author: T. T.

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing so much
customer_reviews.text: Love is an understatement. I am horrible at curling my hair. Like seriously it's really bad. But with this I can curl my entire head of hair and be happy with it in 15 minutes and I have a good amount of hair. I was super skeptical about this and took me a good while to decide to order but I am so glad now that I did. I know I sound like I'm full of it but girl scouts honor best curling iron I have ever used when it comes to ease of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Hair kept getting stuck. & Only curled bottom 1/4 of my hair
customer_reviews.text: I'm sad to report that this just did not work out for me. My hair kept getting stuck in the thing, and it stopped spinning at only the bottom 1/4 of my hair. I tried some tricks to see if it would grab more, and I was sure to only put a little bit of hair in at a time. But still, it looked meh and was extremely difficult to use. A wand is the easiest way for me to curl my hair so I'll just go back to that =(
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Not for long hair.
customer_reviews.text: Not for long or thick hair. You have to use such tiny sections that it takes forever even though it heats up very quickly. Also it seems to make my hair frizzy in weird spots which I imagine is because my hair is so long it ends up wrapping around itself and not the iron in places. I really tried to like this item but it really does not work for long thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Miller

customer_reviews.title: A purchase you won’t regret!
customer_reviews.text: Not surprised that Chi delivers another amazing hair tool. Heats up quickly and leaves flowing curls with a just left the salon look. Took a few minutes to get used to but then it’s a breeze. For those who commented that hair gets tangled and you have to reset, the directions in user manual are incorrect! It says to use the wand with the display on the side closest to/facing your head. That is wrong. The display should face away from your face/head so you can pull the hair over the wand and into the opening.
customer_reviews.author: bcwalker

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: I have frizzy wavy hair that does not like to curl. If it curls, it doesn’t hold well. And that’s if a professional does it! I could not get it to curl By myself with a wand or a straightener ever! I was skeptical of this tool at first because my hair is short to medium length. I was worried that because of this- I wouldn’t get a tight enough curl. 15 minutes later and that worry was gone and I had a head full of bouncing curls.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Love This. Just use small amounts of hair.
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this, I wasn't too sure how it works and the instructions are not too clear. I went to use and it kept putting alarm on cause my hair would get tangled. I got frustrated cause the alarm kept coming on and kept tangling. I finally went on you tube and watched several people use it and realized I was putting too much hair in, which caused it to tangle. Once you know how to use it, it's easy and really does great curls for the hair. It makes the hair shine not frizz like my wand does.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina O'Boyle

customer_reviews.title: I have never been able to curl My hair before this
customer_reviews.text: I have thin hair and curls never stay and I am not very good at doing my hair. This does all the work and with a bit of product the curls really stay in. I can take my time and make it look amazing or fancy or take 5 minutes and curl thick chucks before I walk out the door for an effortless "I put effort into looking nice" look!
customer_reviews.author: jodi

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have pin straight hair and it doesn’t like to hold curls. Also, I’ve never been able to use any kind of curling iron, I just don’t have the hand-eye coordination for it. BUT, this product is ABSOLUTELY AMAZING! Seriously the easiest thing I’ve ever used, if you can stand up straight and hold a stick next to your head, you can use this and have incredibly cute curls. I love this product and have already recommended it to everyone i know.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C

customer_reviews.title: Best hair curler on the market
customer_reviews.text: I finally found the perfect hair curler for my long hair. It heats up super fast, is so easy to use and the curls last all day. It is also super safe, no more accidental curler burns. This curler is seriously idiot proof, my curls always come out perfect every time. I honestly have never loved my hair as much as I do now that I have the Spin N Curl. The price is completely worth it since I no longer have to pay someone to get beautiful curls that last.
customer_reviews.author: Mags818

customer_reviews.title: Not for Everyone
customer_reviews.text: I have to start by saying that my hair is stick straight. I really wanted to like this but it didn't really curl my hair and when it did the curls were gone in less than an hour. It takes more time to use this than to use my curling iron. Curling iron curls last all day. With the Chi I did use product before and after and still no success. I think the idea of this is good and it won't burn you. I sent mine back.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Hanshaw

customer_reviews.title: So simple to use and beautiful curls
customer_reviews.text: I love this automatic curler. It curled my hair in half the time it normally takes me with a wand and the curls are beautiful. It was a little hard to get the back but that’s to be expected and I was able to manage it. The product feels sturdy like it will last and came with a piece of Velcro that helps keep the cord from getting tangled.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Love love love love
customer_reviews.text: I'd definitely pay for another one in a heart beat. My hair is thick and hard for me to curl, with this it made it so easy. My hairs a bit longer then shoulder length and it took me about 15 mins. I absolutely love this curler and plus it's a chi so its top line do I need to say anymore???? Its a no brainer
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service from Chi!
customer_reviews.text: The Curl and Spin did not work. I spent at least an hour trying, before using the"chat" function on the Chi web sight. Ended up sending it back. Then 2 1/2days later they reply with directions on resetting using power and directional buttons. Why don't they have this with the directions included with the product? Or reply more promptly to questions!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS CURLER IS AWESOME.! IT DOES EXACTLY WHAT IT SUPPOSE TO. DOES NOT TANGLE IN YOUR HAIR. IF YOU GET TO MUCH HAIR INTO CURLER IT WILL ONLY STOP. CURLS ARE LOVELY AND LASTING. I WILL NEVER GO WITHOUT ONE OF THESE AGAIN!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have med/long (couple of inches below shoulders) thick hair a little course. I was skeptical, but thought I'd give it a try taking advantage of the lower price. I won't lie, it takes some extra time, but I expected it. The curling iron I used took as much time and burned my hair. This beeps when it is time to release it. There is a little learning curve as far as how much hair to portion off and getting the correct angle. I've had it for a couple of weeks and getting better at it. As long as the quality is there and it lasts, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ntrl Redhead

customer_reviews.title: So easy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not good at doing my hair, and have tried many different curling irons over the years, all stating to be simple and easy to use, but they weren't. This one actually is. You turn it on, set the temp, then lay some hair over it and push a button. So simple! Now I can have curly hair without going to the salon! You just have to make sure you don't put too much hair in at once - it doesn't tangle, it just beeps at you. And it's a bit awkward to reach the back of your head, but just takes a little practice. Very impressed with how easy it is to use.
customer_reviews.author: blue7735

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use with great curl
customer_reviews.text: I love this iron and it’s so easy to use. My hair curls easily so I only keep my hair in about 2 seconds or I look like Nellie Olson. (If you’re under the age of 40 you probably won’t get that reference) Anyway...it’s pricey, but if simplicity and good curl are what you’re looking for, this is perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use! Can get beachy waves or full curls!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use! Exactly what I needed. Always wanted to try and style my hair as it’s naturally flat and boring but idk how to style hair! This Chi Spin n Curl makes it so simple! Just watch a video for demonstration and before you know it you’ll be a pro! I also bought the heat protectant spray and their hairspray. And yes you can do beachy waves! Just don’t pull the hair the full way thru. Very happy👍
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. This curling iron is so easy to use and creates a really nice curl. My hair is very fine and doesn’t hold a curl well without products but they keep better than they ever have with this iron. Bonus, it’s not hot on your hands. Since my hair is fine and long, I was concerned about my hair tangling but it hasn’t tangled in it once! Highly recommend! I think this would even be good for Kids as young as 8 years old once shown how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Twila

customer_reviews.title: my hair kept getting stuck
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it, my hair kept getting stuck. I never even finished curling my hair one complete time.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: My regular curling wand works better
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this curler. I watched several videos and reviews that made it look like a safer way to get beautiful curls. It was easy to use but took just as long to curl my hair. I used this curler several times and the curls immediately fall. I get much better results with my regular curling wand and this curler isn’t worth the money. Returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Heats fast Easy to use Cons: RIDICULOUSLY EXPENSIVE Time consuming- especially if you have thicker hair. It’s expensive considering it’s just a curling iron... But if you’re like me... hopeless when it comes to styling your hair... this is a must!
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I can get why people like this, but ultimately I feel like it’s not worth the price tag. I did get my hair tangled a few times which was pretty terrifying but luckily didn’t burn or pull out any chunks, which it seems like it could. Curls looked just like what I get from a regular 1 inch barrel, and was barely any faster (if at all).
customer_reviews.author: cst

customer_reviews.title: Professional curls at home!!
customer_reviews.text: Tried this for the first time today. Did NOT take long to get the hang of it. Very happy with ease of use and how the curls looked in the end. My hair does not like holding curl but did decent with this. I’m a wash and go kind of gal so didn’t have much in the way of hair products handy. I’m definitely going to invest in something to both protect my hair from heat styling and help my hair hold the curl a bit more. Overall very happy with this device!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Kolhoff

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Makes my thin, stringy, frizzy hair look great!
customer_reviews.text: This styling tool transformed my hair from yukky to professional. I started a new job and needed a style appropriate for the office. So grateful to have this tool. I section my hair in baby claw clips and then, go and curl each section. Took me two days to get the hang of it. I love the spiral look! Takes me about 30 minutes to clip and curl. Lasts all day with a light finish spray.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing invention! I’m curling iron and flat iron challenged, this is so easy to use. The curls come out looking like a professional did them. And it only took me about 7 minutes to curl my whole head. You don’t have to use small sections of hair either. Hair won’t get tangled or knotted ever, I was worried about that. I’ve had similar irons like this and they got tangled. I can’t say enough good things about this! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: victoria hallman

customer_reviews.title: Safe for a young pre-teen to use
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a Christmas present for our granddaughter. It looks like a very sturdy product. Our granddaughter is a pre-teen. She was very happy to receive this but it will take practice to get the curls she wants. She has very long hair. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Bielarczyk

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for short hair!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after seeing my sister use it on her hair. I was worried about how it would do on short hair. I didn't want kinky curls. This worked perfectly and the curls stayed for two days until I washed my hair. I have never had curls last more than a couple hours.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth hancock

customer_reviews.title: item quit working after only using it 5 times
customer_reviews.text: This product was great when it worked. It quit working after 5 times. The company makes you send a bank money order with the product, to pay for their shipping you a new one. Very disappointed. Company does not stand behind their product better than that.
customer_reviews.author: miller

customer_reviews.title: Strongly suggest for quick beautiful curls!
customer_reviews.text: My old automatic hair curler died on me. This one looked weird but had reviews so I gave it a try. I love it. Easy to use and produces beautiful curls. My hair is very long and this curler allowed me to do all of my hair within 10 minutes. I would definitely suggest this product, especially to other busy women who want quality curls quick.
customer_reviews.author: Matilda

customer_reviews.title: Best ever hair curler you can ever ask for
customer_reviews.text: This is what I have been searching for!! My hair is so straight, it’s very hard to make it curled. This product made it curled like a wonder, loose curl or strong curl, by adjusting volume. I never worry about getting myself burned. Slightly heavy but it’s ok. I also used the hair product from Chi for heat, to protect my hair. Works well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Fern Wong

product_meta.title: CHI Spin N Curl in Onyx Black
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackHair is drawn into the curl chamber where it is heated and timed to create perfect curls and waves every time! The digital temperature display offers easily adjustable temperature settings and a selection of preset temperature settings for each hair texture, creating a customizable styling experience while avoiding unnecessary heat damage. Ceramic heat technology produces far infrared heat while the conditioning benefits of negative ions results in shinier, healthier and more beautiful hair. Curling hair has never been so effortless with the CHI Air Spin n Curl!. Low 370°F for Fine Hair ,Medium 390°F for Medium Hair ,High 410°F for Coarse Hair. Tips- Use a smaller section of hair for defined curls.Use a larger section of hair for less defined curls.If hair becomes tangled, the Spin n Curl will beep continuously and the display will read RESET. Push the power button on the Spin n Curl to turn off and gently remove the tangled hair by pulling out thin strands, section by section, until all the hair has been removed.Includes Pre-set Temperatures:Low 370°F for Fine Hair,Medium 390°F for Medium Hair,High 410°F for Coarse Hair. Care: 1. Clean the surface of the Spin n Curl with a damp cloth. 2. Turn on the Spin n Curl by pressing the power button. 3. Insert the barrel cleaner into the curling chamber in correct position below. 4. Press the left or right arrow buttons to automatically remove residue. For safety purposes, the Spin n Curl stops heating up when the cleaning function is active. 5. Recommend cleaning the Spin n Curl once a week

BRAND STORY
Farouk Systems, Inc. is a Houston-based company of hairdressers for hairdressers, known for manufacturing high-quality professional hair care products under the industry-leading brands CHI®, BioSilk®, and SunGlitz®.
feature_bullets: Hair is drawn into the curl chamber where it is heated and timed to create perfect curls and waves every time
Digital temperature display ; 1” Ceramic Rotating Barrel
One hour auto shutoff and dual voltage
